name: A Mile in My Shoes (avarisclari)
description: Take a short hike in the woods and see some of the thoughts I have as I walk. currently very short, I may add more trails or thoughts in the future, but this was just because I wanted to make something short in RPG Maker. There also is no in game audio, I chose to do this on purpose. It's to enjoy being "outside" in the game.
